items.customDescription: It's advisable to conceal these since there's no telling who might attempt to take them.

attacks.name: Quicksand Quake
attacks.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An avoidable attack that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>.

attacks.name: Shadow Sandstorm
attacks.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An avoidable attack that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>.

attacks.name: Explosive Barrage
attacks.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An avoidable attack that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>.

attacks.name: Blightfire
attacks.description: Attack once dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage (Can miss). On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack once dealing <damage> damage (Can Miss). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Crushing Double Jab
attacks.description: Perform 2 attacks that deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the 1st attack and ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your normal damage on the 2nd attack.

attacks.name: Ankh Life Drain
attacks.description: Fire an unavoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage. The enemy is healed for ${lifesteal}% of damage dealt.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Fire an unavoidable attack that deals <damage> damage. <Attacker> <attis> healed for <lifesteal> of damage dealt.

attacks.name: Eternal Wrath
attacks.description: The enemy casts a Eternal Wrath on you that applies 1 stacks of wrath if it hits you (Avoidable).
attacks.descriptionGenerator: The enemy casts a Eternal Wrath on you that applies 1 stacks of wrath if it hits <target> (Avoidable).

attacks.name: Pharaohs Judgement
attacks.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage. On a hit, applies global evasion for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An avoidable attack that deals <damage> damage. On a hit, <hitEffect>.
